import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { Link,useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import Cart from '../meals/cart'; import Search from './search'; const Header = () => { const [checkLocation,setCheckLocation] = useState(false) const location = useLocation().pathname.slice(1,6) if(location === 'meals'){ setCheckLocation(true) } return (
